<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 22.5pt 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249); word-break: break-all; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">摘要：</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">对软件实现负载均衡的几个软件，小<span lang="EN-US">D</span>详细看了一下，从性能和稳定上还是<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>最牛，基本达到了<span lang="EN-US">F5</span>硬件设备的<span lang="EN-US">60%</span>性能，其他几个<span lang="EN-US">10%</span>都有点困难。
不过就因为<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>忒牛了，配置也最麻烦了，而且健康检测需要另外配置<span lang="EN-US">Ldirector</span>，其他<span lang="EN-US">HAPROXY</span>和<span lang="EN-US">NGINX</span>自己就用，而且配置超级简单。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">对软件实现<span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.linuxso.com/fuzai/" target="_blank"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="color:#00C1DE;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">负载均衡</span></a></span>的几个软件，小<span lang="EN-US">D</span>详细看了一下，从性能和稳定上还是<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>最牛，基本达到了<span lang="EN-US">F5</span>硬件设备的<span lang="EN-US">60%</span>性能，其他几个<span lang="EN-US">10%</span>都有点困难。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">不过就因为<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>忒牛了，配置也最麻烦了，而且健康检测需要另外配置<span lang="EN-US">Ldirector</span>，其他<span lang="EN-US">HAPROXY</span>和<span lang="EN-US">NGINX</span>自己就用，而且配置超级简单。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">所以小<span lang="EN-US">D</span>建议，如果网站访问量不是门户级别的用<span lang="EN-US">HAPROXY</span>或者<span lang="EN-US">NGINX</span>就<span lang="EN-US">OK</span>了，到了门户级别在用<span lang="EN-US">LVS+Idirector</span>吧 哈哈<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#464646;mso-font-kerning:0pt">lvs</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#464646;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>都可以用作多机负载的方案，它们各有优缺，在生产环境中需要好好分析实际情况并加以利用。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
</span>首先提醒，做技术切不可人云亦云，我云即你云；同时也不可太趋向保守，过于相信旧有方式而等别人来帮你做垫被测试。把所有即时听说到的好东西加以钻研，从而提高自己对技术的认知和水平，乃是一个好习惯。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
</span>下面来分析一下两者：<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
</span>一、<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>的优势：<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
1</span>、抗负载能力强，因为<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>工作方式的逻辑是非常之简单，而且工作在网络<span lang="EN-US">4</span>层仅做请求分发之用，没有流量，所以在效率上基本不需要太过考虑。在我手里的<span lang="EN-US"> lvs</span>，仅仅出过一次问题：在并发最高的一小段时间内均衡器出现丢包现象，据分析为网络问题，即网卡或<span lang="EN-US">linux2.4</span>内核的承载能力已到上限，内存和<span lang="EN-US"> </span></span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.linuxso.com/command/cp.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#00C1DE;mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;
text-underline:none">cp</span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#464646;mso-font-kerning:0pt">u</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#464646;mso-font-kerning:0pt">方面基本无消耗。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
2</span>、配置性低，这通常是一大劣势，但同时也是一大优势，因为没有太多可配置的选项，所以除了增减服务器，并不需要经常去触碰它，大大减少了人为出错的几率。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
3</span>、工作稳定，因为其本身抗负载能力很强，所以稳定性高也是顺理成章，另外各种<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>都有完整的双机热备方案，所以一点不用担心均衡器本身会出什么问题，节点出现故障的话，<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>会自动判别，所以系统整体是非常稳定的。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
4</span>、无流量，上面已经有所提及了。<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>仅仅分发请求，而流量并不从它本身出去，所以可以利用它这点来做一些线路分流之用。没有流量同时也保住了均衡器的<span lang="EN-US">IO</span>性能不会受到大流量的影响。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
5</span>、基本上能支持所有应用，因为<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>工作在<span lang="EN-US">4</span>层，所以它可以对几乎所有应用做负载均衡，包括<span lang="EN-US">http</span>、数据库、聊天室等等。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
</span>另：<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>也不是完全能判别节点故障的，譬如在<span lang="EN-US">wlc</span>分配方式下，<span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.linuxso.com/linuxjiqun/" target="_blank"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="color:#00C1DE;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">集群</span></a></span>里有一个节点没有配置<span lang="EN-US">VIP</span>，会使整个集群不能使用，这时使用<span lang="EN-US">wrr</span>分配方式则会丢掉一台机。目前这个问题还在进一步测试中。所以，用<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>也得多多当心为妙。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
</span>二、<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>和<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>作对比的结果<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
1</span>、<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>工作在网络的<span lang="EN-US">7</span>层，所以它可以针对<span lang="EN-US">http</span>应用本身来做分流策略，比如针对域名、目录结构等，相比之下<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>并不具备这样的功能，所以<span lang="EN-US"> nginx</span>单凭这点可利用的场合就远多于<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>了；但<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>有用的这些功能使其可调整度要高于<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>，所以经常要去触碰触碰，由<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>的第<span lang="EN-US">2</span>条优点 看，触碰多了，人为出问题的几率也就会大。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
2</span>、<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>对网络的依赖较小，理论上只要<span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.linuxso.com/command/ping.html" target="_blank"><span style="color:#00C1DE;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">ping</span></a></span>得通，网页访问正常，<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>就能连得通，<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>同时还能区分内外网，如果是同时拥有内外网的
节点，就相当于单机拥有了备份线路；<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>就比较依赖于网络环境，目前来看服务器在同一网段内并且<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>使用<span lang="EN-US">direct</span>方式分流，效果较能得到保证。另 外注意，<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>需要向托管商至少申请多一个<span lang="EN-US">ip</span>来做<span lang="EN-US">Vi</span></span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.linuxso.com/command/su.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#00C1DE;mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;
text-underline:none">su</span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#464646;mso-font-kerning:0pt">al IP</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#464646;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，貌似是不能用本身的<span lang="EN-US">IP</span>来做<span lang="EN-US">VIP</span>的。要做好<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>管理员，确实得跟进学习很多有关网络通信方面的知识，就不再是一个<span lang="EN-US">HTTP</span>那么简单了。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
3</span>、<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>安装和配置比较简单，测试起来也很方便，因为它基本能把错误用日志打印出来。<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>的安装和配置、测试就要花比较长的时间了，因为同上所述，<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>对网络依赖比较大，很多时候不能配置成功都是因为网络问题而不是配置问题，出了问题要解决也相应的会麻烦得多。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
4</span>、<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>也同样能承受很高负载且稳定，但负载度和稳定度差<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>还有几个等级：<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>处理所有流量所以受限于机器<span lang="EN-US">IO</span>和配置；本身的<span lang="EN-US">bug</span>也还是难以避免的；<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>没有现成的双机热备方案，所以跑在单机上还是风险较大，单机上的事情全都很难说。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
5</span>、<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>可以检测到服务器内部的故障，比如根据服务器处理网页返回的状态码、超时等等，并且会把返回错误的请求重新提交到另一个节点。目前<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>中<span lang="EN-US"> ldirectd</span>也能支持针对服务器内部的情况来监控，但<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>的原理使其不能重发请求。重发请求这点，譬如用户正在上传一个文件，而处理该上传的节点刚 好在上传过程中出现故障，<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>会把上传切到另一台服务器重新处理，而<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>就直接断掉了，如果是上传一个很大的文件或者很重要的文件的话，用户可能
会因此而恼火。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
6</span>、<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>对请求的异步处理可以帮助节点服务器减轻负载，假如使用<span lang="EN-US">apache</span>直接对外服务，那么出现很多的窄带链接时<span lang="EN-US">apache</span>服务器将会占用大
量内存而不能释放，使用多一个<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>做<span lang="EN-US">apache</span>代理的话，这些窄带链接会被<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>挡住，<span lang="EN-US">apache</span>上就不会堆积过多的请求，这样就减少了相 当多的内存占用。这点使用<span lang="EN-US">squ</span></span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.linuxso.com/command/id.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#00C1DE;mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;
text-underline:none">id</span></a></span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#464646;mso-font-kerning:0pt">也有相同的作用，即使<span lang="EN-US">squid</span>本身配置为不缓存，对<span lang="EN-US">apache</span>还是有很大帮助的。<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>没有这些功能，也就无法能 比较。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
7</span>、<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>能支持<span lang="EN-US">http</span>和<span lang="EN-US">email</span>（<span lang="EN-US">email</span>的功能估计比较少人用），<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>所支持的应用在这点上会比<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>更多。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
</span>在使用上，一般最前端所采取的策略应是<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>，也就是<span lang="EN-US">DNS</span>的指向应为<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>均衡器，<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>的优点令它非常适合做这个任务。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
</span>重要的<span lang="EN-US">ip</span>地址，最好交由<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>托管，比如数据库的<span lang="EN-US">ip</span>、<span lang="EN-US">webservice</span>服务器的<span lang="EN-US">ip</span>等等，这些<span lang="EN-US">ip</span>地址随着时间推移，使用面会越来越大，如果更换<span lang="EN-US">ip</span>则故障会接踵而至。所以将这些重要<span lang="EN-US">ip</span>交给<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>托管是最为稳妥的，这样做的唯一缺点是需要的<span lang="EN-US">VIP</span>数量会比较多。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
nginx</span>可作为<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>节点机器使用，一是可以利用<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>的功能，二是可以利用<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>的性能。当然这一层面也可以直接使用<span lang="EN-US">squid</span>，<span lang="EN-US">squid</span>的功能方面就比<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>弱不少了，性能上也有所逊色于<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
nginx</span>也可作为中层代理使用，这一层面<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>基本上无对手，唯一可以撼动<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>的就只有<span lang="EN-US">lig</span></span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.linuxso.com/command/httpd.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#00C1DE;mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;
text-underline:none">httpd</span></a></span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#464646;mso-font-kerning:0pt">了，不过<span lang="EN-US">lighttpd</span>目前还没有 能做到<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>完全的功能，配置也不那么清晰易读。另外，中层代理的<span lang="EN-US">IP</span>也是重要的，所以中层代理也拥有一个<span lang="EN-US">VIP</span>和<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>是最完美的方案了。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>
nginx</span>也可作为网页静态服务器，不过超出了本文讨论的范畴，简单提一下。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<br>

"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">具体的应用还得具体分析，如果是比较小的网站（日<span lang="EN-US">PV<1000</span>万），用<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>就完全可以了，如果机器也不少，可以用<span lang="EN-US">DNS</span>轮询，<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>所耗费的机器还是比较多的；大型网站或者重要的服务，机器不发愁的时候，要多多考虑利用<span lang="EN-US">lvs</span>。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">****************************************************************************************************************<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Nginx</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的优点<span lang="EN-US">:<br>
</span>性能好，可以负载超过<span lang="EN-US">1</span>万的并发。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>功能多，除了负载均衡，还能作<span lang="EN-US">Web</span>服务器，而且可以通过<span lang="EN-US">Geo</span>模块来实现流量分配。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>社区活跃，第三方补丁和模块很多<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>支持<span lang="EN-US">g</span></span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.linuxso.com/command/zip.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#00C1DE;mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;
text-underline:none">zip</span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> proxy<br>
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">缺点<span lang="EN-US">:<br>
</span>不支持<span lang="EN-US">session</span>保持。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>对后端<span lang="EN-US">rea</span></span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.linuxso.com/command/ls.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#00C1DE;mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;
text-underline:none">ls</span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">erver</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的健康检查功能效果不好。而且只支持通过端口来检测，不支持通过<span lang="EN-US">url</span>来检测。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
nginx</span>对<span lang="EN-US">big request header</span>的支持不是很好，如果<span lang="EN-US">client_header_buffer_size</span>设置的比较小，就会返回<span lang="EN-US">400bad
request</span>页面。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
Haproxy</span>的优点<span lang="EN-US">:<br>
</span>它的优点正好可以补充<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>的缺点。支持<span lang="EN-US">session</span>保持，同时支持通过获取指定的<span lang="EN-US">url</span>来检测后端服务器的状态。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>支持<span lang="EN-US">tcp</span>模式的负载均衡。比如可以给<span lang="EN-US">mysql</span>的从服务器集群和邮件服务器做负载均衡。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>缺点：<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>不支持虚拟主机<span lang="EN-US">(</span>这个很傻啊<span lang="EN-US">)<br>
</span>目前没有<span lang="EN-US">nagios</span>和<span lang="EN-US">cacti</span>的性能监控模板<span lang="EN-US"><br>
LVS</span>的优点<span lang="EN-US">:<br>
</span>性能好，接近硬件设备的网络吞吐和连接负载能力。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
LVS</span>的<span lang="EN-US">DR</span>模式，支持通过广域网进行负载均衡。这个其他任何负载均衡软件目前都不具备。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>缺点：<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>比较重型。另外社区不如<span lang="EN-US">nginx</span>活跃。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">*************************************************************************************<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">现在网络中常见的的负载均衡主要分为两种：一种是通过硬件来进行进行，常见的硬件有比较昂贵的<span lang="EN-US">NetScaler</span>、<span lang="EN-US">F5</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Radware</span>和<span lang="EN-US">Array</span>等商用的负载均衡器，也有类似于<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>、<span lang="EN-US">HAproxy</span>的基于<span lang="EN-US">Linux</span>的开源的负载均衡策略<span lang="EN-US">,</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">商用负载均衡里面<span lang="EN-US">NetScaler</span>从效果上比<span lang="EN-US">F5</span>的效率上更高。对于负载均衡器来说，不过商用负载均衡由于可以建立在四<span lang="EN-US">~</span>七层协议之上，因此适用
面更广所以有其不可替代性，他的优点就是有专业的维护团队来对这些服务进行维护、缺点就是花销太大，所以对于规模较小的网络服务来说暂时还没有需要使用。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">另一种负载均衡的方式是通过软件：比较常见的有<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>、<span lang="EN-US">HAproxy</span>等，其中<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>是建立在四层协议上面的，而另外<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>和<span lang="EN-US">HAproxy</span>是建立在七层协议之上的，下面分别介绍关于<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">LVS</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">：使用集群技术和<span lang="EN-US">Linux</span>操作系统实现一个高性能、高可用的服务器，它具有很好的可伸缩性（<span lang="EN-US">Scalability</span>）、可靠性（<span lang="EN-US">Reliability</span>）和可管理性（<span lang="EN-US">Manageability</span>）。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">LVS</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的特点是：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、抗负载能力强、是工作在网络<span lang="EN-US">4</span>层之上仅作分发之用，没有流量的产生；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、工作稳定，自身有完整的双机热备方案；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">4</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、无流量，保证了均衡器<span lang="EN-US">IO</span>的性能不会收到大流量的影响；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;

"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、应用范围比较广，可以对所有应用做负载均衡；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、工作在网络的<span lang="EN-US">7</span>层之上，可以针对<span lang="EN-US">http</span>应用做一些分流的策略，比如针对域名、目录结构；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>对网络的依赖比较小；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;

"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>安装和配置比较简单，测试起来比较方便；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">4</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、也可以承担高的负载压力且稳定，一般能支撑超过<span lang="EN-US">1</span>万次的并发；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">5</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>可以通过端口检测到服务器内部的故障，比如根据服务器处理网页返回的状态码、超时等等，并且会把返回错误的请求重新提交到另一个节点，不过其中缺点就是不支持<span lang="EN-US">url</span>来检测；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">6</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>对请求的异步处理可以帮助节点服务器减轻负载；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">7</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>能支持<span lang="EN-US">http</span>和<span lang="EN-US">Email</span>，这样就在适用范围上面小很多；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">8</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;

"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的特点是：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、<span lang="EN-US">HAProxy</span>是工作在网络<span lang="EN-US">7</span>层之上。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、能够补充<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>的一些缺点比如<span lang="EN-US">Session</span>的保持，<span lang="EN-US">Cookie</span>的引导等工作<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、支持<span lang="EN-US">url</span>检测后端的服务器出问题的检测会有很好的帮助。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">4</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、更多的负载均衡策略比如：动态加权轮循<span lang="EN-US">(Dynamic Round Robin)</span>，加权源地址哈希<span lang="EN-US">(Weighted
Source Hash)</span>，加权<span lang="EN-US">URL</span>哈希和加权参数哈希<span lang="EN-US">(Weighted
Parameter Hash)</span>已经实现<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">5</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、单纯从效率上来讲<span lang="EN-US">HAProxy</span>更会比<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>有更出色的负载均衡速度。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;

"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、<span lang="EN-US">HAProxy</span>可以对<span lang="EN-US">Mysql</span>进行负载均衡，对后端的<span lang="EN-US">DB</span>节点进行检测和负载均衡。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#ED1C24;mso-font-kerning:0pt">现在网站发展的趋势对网络负载均衡的使用是随着网站规模的提升根据不同的阶段来使用不同的技术：</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">第一阶段：利用<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>或者<span lang="EN-US">HAProxy</span>进行单点的负载均衡，这一阶段服务器规模刚脱离开单服务器、单数据库的模式，需要一定的负载均衡，但是 仍然规模较小没有专业的维护团队来进行维护，也没有需要进行大规模的网站部署。这样利用<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>或者<span lang="EN-US">HAproxy</span>就是第一选择，此时这些东西上手快， 配置容易，在七层之上利用<span lang="EN-US">HTTP</span>协议就可以。这时是第一选择<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">第二阶段：随着网络服务进一步扩大，这时单点的<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>已经不能满足，这时使用<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>或者商用<span lang="EN-US">F5</span>就是首要选择，<span lang="EN-US">Nginx</span>此时就作为<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>或者<span lang="EN-US"> F5</span>的节点来使用，具体<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>或者<span lang="EN-US">F5</span>的是选择是根据公司规模，人才以及资金能力来选择的，这里也不做详谈，但是一般来说这阶段相关人才跟不上业务的提
升，所以购买商业负载均衡已经成为了必经之路。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">第三阶段：这时网络服务已经成为主流产品，此时随着公司知名度也进一步扩展，相关人才的能力以及数量也随之提升，这时无论从开发适合自身产品的定制，以及降低成本来讲开源的<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>，已经成为首选，这时<span lang="EN-US">LVS</span>会成为主流。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 24pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFangSC",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">最终形成比较理想的状态为：<span lang="EN-US">F5/LVS<</span>—<span lang="EN-US">>Haproxy<</span>—<span lang="EN-US">>Squid/Varnish<</span>—<span lang="EN-US">>AppServer</span>。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
